song_lyrics: Swāmī amāre ang tam rang ḍhoḷī do,
Sansārī utāro rang antar roḷī do... 1
Nachāvo tem ame nāchshu, rang ḍhoḷī do,
Paṭ paherāvo bhagvā ang antar roḷī do... 2
Chhīe ushardharṇī samā, rang ḍhoḷī do,
Tame relāvo hetāḷ gang antar roḷī do... 3
Dhartī bīchchhāne poḍhshu, rang ḍhoḷī do,
Ma-bhaktino khelshu uchang antar roḷī do... 4
Pīshu harimukh chāndnī, rang ḍhoḷī do,
Ame hilaḷshu sāgar tarang antar roḷī do... 5
Ame valvaltī vādḷī, rang ḍhoḷī do,
Megh varso Ashāḍhī umang antar roḷī do... 6
Haraṇ ame bhavraṇ ghumyā, rang ḍhoḷī do,
Āj gaganmā daīe chhalang antar roḷī do... 7
Chhīe patang bhale pātḷā, rang ḍhoḷī do,
Toy ‘Akshar’nā tej bharyā ang antar roḷī do... 8
title: Swāmī amāre ang tam rang ḍhoḷī do

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-1010: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
